name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Review Lens - Visual Feedback For UI Reviews

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Draw, annotate and comment directly on-top of your website's UI, then instantly post your feedback to a merge or pull request.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Review Lens (https://reviewlens.io) makes it easier for digital product teams to communicate design and development feedback.

Integrates with GitHub, GitLab and Bitbucket. Post to merge requests, pull requests, existing issues, new issues, copy to clipboard, download to file and more!

⭐ Release, iterate and build faster
Providing UI feedback has never been been so quick. It only takes a few clicks to post annotated feedback directly to pull requests or issues.

⭐ Supports any kind of web project
Review Lens works with all websites, web applications and SPAs. Everything you need is all within your browser, no external tools or image editor software required.

⭐ The missing tool in software development
✅ Post feedback for new UI concepts and designs.
✅ Post feedback for features in development.
✅ Post feedback for features or bugs in production.

⭐ Improve communication and collaboration
Be more clear, descriptive and concise with visual feedback. Explain exactly what you need to say with annotations more efficiently and effectively.

-------------------

By installing and using this extension/add-on/plugin you agree to the Review Lens Privacy Policy (https://reviewlens.io/privacy) and Terms of Use (https://reviewlens.io/terms).
